events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund case due to return of the item.
This case has been routed to agent John Smith, who specializes in refund processing.
Hello! I'm John, happy to assist you with your return and refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can help you further?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the jacket is too small, so I would like to return it for a refund.
Thanks for the info! I’ve processed your return request, and you’ll receive an email with shipping instructions shortly.
Great, I appreciate the quick help. I'll wait for the shipping details to send the jacket back.
Your return has been successfully initiated, and once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed immediately.
Just checking in to confirm that you have sent back the jacket and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
I’ve shipped the jacket yesterday and received the refund. Thanks for your excellent service!
We are closing this case as the refund was successfully completed and you confirmed receipt. Thank you!
We have sent a survey invitation to gather your feedback about the refund process and overall experience.
